baseline_groups.claim_summary: Subjects bid higher in Common Value auctions than Common Probability auctions.
baseline_groups.notes: 3 baseline rows with same spec_id for 3 outcomes. Lab experiment, 360 subjects, 4 experiments.

global_notes: Paper: The Common-Probability Auction Puzzle (AER: Insights). Note: 3 rows share spec_id 'baseline' with different outcomes. Cross-experiment specs replicate across experimental designs.
